_comment_priority: Priority order: Specific gates > Gate ranges > Wildcards

_comment_examples.specific: B3 will always be JBU (overrides B1-B11 range)
_comment_examples.range: B1-B11 assigns AAL to gates B1, B2, B4-B11 (B3 excluded by specific)
_comment_examples.wildcard: B# handles any B gates not covered by specific or range assignments
_comment_examples.multiple_airlines: E# randomly selects from ASA, ACA, or UAL for E gates

_comment_less_common_airports: Airports used for GA traffic destinations. Customize this list for your region.
_comment_artcc_airport_groups: Named groups of airports for enroute scenario arrival/departure selections. Format: ICAO:runway,runway,runway,ICAO:runway,runway. Runways specify ACTIVE runways for CIFP SID/STAR parsing and routing. The group name serves as the dropdown label. You should have a geojson file in /airport_data/ for each airport you intend to use.
